thread.title: EDMUND OH
thread.title_full: ScreenCountry Inc reviewed by EDMUND OH

author: EDMUND OH
title: EDMUND OH
text: Before I found ScreenCountry I gave up on my laptop's screen ever being right again. However after purchasing a replacement screen from them and receiving it very quickly in a foreign country, I am absolutely amazed at the new life my laptop has received. Fast and reliable delivery, excellent communication and good value for money, I strongly recommend ScreenCountry and it's products to everyone!
